thread.title: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi to open in September
thread.title_full: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi to open in September | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi to open in September
text:
(MENAFN Press) Jannah Hotels & Resorts has recently announced a new addition to its on growing portfolio, the upcoming landmark will open to the public by September 15, 2015. 
Nehme Imad Darwiche, Jannah Hotels & Resorts CEO, said, "The opening 
of Jannah Place Abu Dhabi hotel highlights our further growth in the beautiful capital Abu Dhabi, which is one of the most important and fastest growing markets in the region."
"Since the group is a national company, it is necessary to push and expand our properties across all the Emirates," he added. 
"Our company is currently working on opening more hotels in Dubai and other emirates we also aim to expand regionally and globally," Darwiche said.

Mr Darwiche noted that the UAE is recording a steady growth in the tourism sector and Jannah Hotels & Resorts seeks part in it.
The Jannah Place Abu Dhabi will commence under the Jannah Place brand; the project consists of 15 floors plus a special roof space. 

Each floor consist of 4 Two bedroom apartments with Exclusive Jannah Place signature design while the one-of-a-kind Rooftop space consist of a 1 One Bedroom and 2 Two Bedrooms Jannah Place Signature Design Suites. "The Suites enjoys an amazing view, from the higher levels guest can experience a mesmerizing and the infinite view of Abu Dhabi," he said.

All the Suites are fully furnished and fully serviced, the project also enjoys the unique Jannah Signature Exclusive Karim Services. The entire building is under 24/7 surveillance of high-tech security cameras and highly trained security talents. There is internationally renowned Costa Coffee and multicultural food outlets nearby
Three level parking spaces are available for first class guests at all times, there is also a quick response Engineering and Housekeeping Team. The upcoming Jannah Place Abu Dhabi is located in a prime location with coffee shops on the ground floor and Multi-Cultural dinning outlets nearby. It is located minutes away from the Famous Al Wahda Mall, Abu Dhabi .
